original_title: Sri Lanka bonds close steady, rupee 317.25/318.00 to dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka bonds were steady at close, dealers said while the spot US dollar closed at 317.25/318.00 rupees.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 opened at 15.15/15.75 percent steady at 14.50/75 percent from opening on Thursday.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 closed at 15.15/15.75 percent, after not being quoted in the previous sessions.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 closed at 15.15/15.75 percent, after not being quoted in the previous sessions.(Colombo/ July10/2023)
